resources.string:
Welcome to Sensors2PD!

Create your patch using desired receivers, upload to your SDcard and load using Browse menu option.

Look at the Guide menu option if you want any help.

Guide:

You can use any of the receivers from available sensors to interact with your patch.

If Accelerometer is available, you can use these receivers:
 [r sensor1v0], [r sensor1v1], [r sensor1v2]

Touch screen sensors are also available from:
 [r sensorT0vx] to [r sensorT14vx],
 and 
 [r sensorT14vy] to [r sensorT14vy].

You can also use WiFi signal level:
 [r sensorW-WiFiSSID]

Check available sensors below.
Thanks for using Sensors2PD.
